Reviews.Title: So Slow
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: This computer is very very slow. I just got it today, and I am so ready to send it back. Its horrible, and the touch screen sucks.

Reviews.Title: LAGGING!!!
Reviews.Author: Israel
Reviews.Content: Its literately been only two days since a took it out the box and its SLOW all the time. It really gets on my nerves since I bought it for my sister who already had a slow computer. Do not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Decent Mini Laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: Matthew Willis
Reviews.Content: It's relatively slow, but well worth the price of $260. It's better than a tablet for around the same price of one.

Reviews.Title: Low cost and looks great but useless. Frustratingly slow.
Reviews.Author: glass menagerie
Reviews.Content: Very slow. Touchscreen doesn't respond smoothly. Touchpad could use more traction. Don't waste your money on it. Tried to use with a mouse. Still very slow.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: The computer came very fast. My main concern was getting a computer with office on it, which this computer has. This computer was a great deal and I am very happy with it so far. The touch screen works great and it runs a lot faster than my current dinosaur desktop that I built almost 10 years ago. Thanks again!

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel A
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift and not for my personal use but I tested it for a couple of days before it was sent over to the beneficiary, I have not gotten any complaints yet, overall I was impressed with the cute little computer.

Reviews.Title: help
Reviews.Author: Senentia F.
Reviews.Content: I would like to talk to sumbody about dis it dose not work I need to be contact asap thank u

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Carlos A. Morales P
Reviews.Content: Great laptop, brilliant screen, great color and form factor. The right size for casual writer, student and people who travel frequently.

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't recomend it
Reviews.Author: Michael S. Kropinak "Michael1757"
Reviews.Content: FOr one thing,every time I open it up,I've got to sign in,& when I'm writing,like just now,the screen changes to start,& I have to stop typing & swipe the screen,to get back to where I was,or I'll completely lose everything I wrote.I wish I had never bought it.I guess I cou;d send it back,but I've got it already.

Reviews.Title: doesen't hold a charge
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I have purchased this computer twice having the same problem with the computer not holding a charge. I dont know what the problem is but the service with ASUS is horrible all they do is tell me to send it back to amazon and it gets annoying when a product doesnt work once let alone another time....I would not recomend this product

Reviews.Title: love the price, hate the lackluster speed
Reviews.Author: Marqie "Sciencediva"
Reviews.Content: Great size, used for basic computing needs. SLOW! I spent so little on it I am not surprised. if I did not need office I would have purchased a chromebook. Same cost, I faster machine

ProductInfo.Features:
AMD A4-1200 1.00 GHz
2GB DDR3L 1066 MHz
320GB 5400 RPM HDD
AMD HD 8180 Graphics with shared graphics memory
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS X102BA 10.1 inch touchscreen laptop (Pink)
